channel.title: Error running servers and clients!
channel.description:
i need some help on this if u know what it means plz post
'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
when i run server or client
if u know plz post or pm me thanks

item.title: Error running servers and clients!

item.description:

this simply means the following…you do not have the path or classpath created…

therefore no server…
